cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Get ready to make some new friends in our Good Shared 8! Featuring 8 bunks in 30 sqm, this is the largest room at the lowest cost! Each bed has its own reading lamp and bed lockers. And guess what, the room comes with an en-suite bathroom too!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable

Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Save even more money when staying in our Good Shared 6. Featuring six bunks fitting up to 6 people, this bright and clean room has everything you'll need: Free Wifi, individual bed lamp, bed lockers and an en-suite bathroom.

dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Perfect for couples and friends travelling together, this 17sqm fully furnished room comes with twin beds including linens and toiletries. 
En-suite bathroom with shower.
USB plugs + individual reading lamps.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Oct 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Oct 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
